selections.name: Politely Dun
selections.reason: Dominant class runner (Rating 115) with solid speed figures (112). Drops in class effectively and maps well.

selections.name: Eagle Angel
selections.reason: Consistent performer with Speed 111. The main danger to the favorite.

selections.name: Tsitsipas
selections.reason: Speed 110 puts him in the mix. Honest runner who will be competitive.

selections.name: Amizetta
selections.reason: Rating 102 is a step below the top trio but capable of filling a place.

danger_horse.name: Eagle Angel
danger_horse.reason: Only 1 point difference in speed figures; if favorite falters, this is the winner.

selections.name: Under Control
selections.reason: Top rated speed (113) in a maiden field. Wide barrier is the only concern but has the engine to overcome it.

selections.name: The Benchmark
selections.reason: Solid debut performance. Maps well from barrier 4 and should improve.

selections.name: Wombat
selections.reason: Speed 99 is competitive here. Draws perfectly to get a soft run.

selections.name: Racey Casey
selections.reason: Speed 100. Consistent type who will use the inside gate to advantage.

selections.name: Two Sigma
selections.reason: Speed 134 (capped to 113) is superior. Drops in weight and looks well-placed.

selections.name: Charming Deel
selections.reason: Speed 113 matches top pick. Drawn barrier 1 for an economical run.

selections.name: Cat Noir
selections.reason: Speed 111. Consistent mare who is always around the mark in this grade.

selections.name: Enchanted Jenni
selections.reason: Speed 107. Honest performer but gives weight to others with higher ceilings.

danger_horse.name: Charming Deel
danger_horse.reason: Equal top speed figure and gets the run of the race.

selections.name: Headbanger
selections.reason: Speed 105 sets the standard in this maiden. Should have the pace to cross from wide gate.

selections.name: Bourdeto
selections.reason: Speed 103. Solid debut and natural improvement expected.

selections.name: Life After Love
selections.reason: Speed 100. Experienced runner who is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Zubba Storm
selections.reason: Speed 93. Needs to improve but stable is elite.

selections.name: Symphony Of Colour
selections.reason: Speed 139 (capped to 123) is dominant. Class 113 runner in a suitable race.

selections.name: Angel Ladder
selections.reason: Speed 136 (capped to 122). Huge threat with light weight and good draw.

selections.name: Umgawa
selections.reason: Class runner but carries big weight (142lbs). Penalty applies but still rates highly.

selections.name: Mr Magnus
selections.reason: Speed 110. Consistent but likely battling for minor money against top two.

danger_horse.name: Angel Ladder
danger_horse.reason: Receives significant weight advantage over the top pick.

selections.name: Golden Age
selections.reason: Speed 165 (capped to 109). Massive figures for this grade. If he brings A-game, he wins.

selections.name: Sky Watcher
selections.reason: Speed 108. Drawn the rails and maps perfectly.

selections.name: Homeward
selections.reason: Speed 106. Consistent type who will be hitting the line hard.

selections.name: Bold Strike
selections.reason: Speed 105. Honest runner, good barrier.

danger_horse.name: Sky Watcher
danger_horse.reason: Progressive type with the perfect barrier draw.

selections.name: Pula
selections.reason: Speed 184 (capped to 118). Clearly the best horse on figures. Wide gate the only query.

selections.name: Rock Them Jools
selections.reason: Speed 166 (capped to 117). The clear danger. High class animal.

selections.name: Jamesjohno
selections.reason: Speed 151 (capped to 114). Very strong trio at the top here.

selections.name: Swift Power
selections.reason: Speed 109. Best of the rest but a tier below the top 3.

danger_horse.name: Rock Them Jools
danger_horse.reason: Elite speed figures match the top pick.

selections.name: Canara
selections.reason: Speed 136 (capped to 119). Standout performance figures. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2.

selections.name: Austrata
selections.reason: Speed 109. Veteran who is consistent and drawn well.

selections.name: Waco Kid
selections.reason: Speed 106. Solid contender but gives weight to the top pick.

selections.name: Desert Anthem
selections.reason: Speed 106. Honest runner, place chance.
